titleStmt.title: A corrector of the ansvverer to the speech out of doores. Iustifying the vvorthy speech of Master Thomas Chaloner a faithfull Member of the Parlement of England.
titleStmt.author: Marten, Henry, 1602-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: As truly printed by Evan Tyler printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie, as were the Scotish papers,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Marten by Wing.
The imprint is false; probably printed in London.
A reply to Wing B2960: Birkenhead, Sir John. An answer to a speech without doores.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Dec [?]"; date is illegible, probably reads December 2 or 3.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majestie, as were the Scotish papers
